title: Deep and surface mining coal production in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 1970 to 2018
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Deep mined, and Surface mining. The y axis represents Production volume in thousand metric tons and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Deep mined is rapidly decreasing, Surface mining is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Deep mined has decreased by 94.59344775617107 percent.
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Deep mined, and lastly, 2. Surface mining.
Overall across the Year, Deep mined mostly maintained the highest Production volume in thousand metric tons when compared to others with a mean value of 39920.82, and it peaked at 1970.
The botommost line, Surface mining,  has a mean of 12769.47, and peaked at 1990.
yAxis: Production volume in thousand metric tons

Deep mined reported the lowest Production volume in thousand metric tons about 7390.0 in Year 2018
